blog_post.title: Knowledge regarding web designing
blog_post.description: Basic coding and programming knowledge in a few languages can help web designers better integrate textual content and visuals with a website's interactive functions. Understanding languages like HTML5, CSS 3 and JavaScript can benefit web designers.

blog_post.title: Web development requirement
blog_post.description: Anyone can become a web developer. You don’t need to be a tech wizard or possess a never-ending list of formal qualifications; as long as you’re passionate about the field and willing to learn, a career in web development is well within your reach.
